TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DiagnosticsConfigurationHandler extends System.Object implements class System.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler

summary.span: Handles the diagnostics section of configuration files.

span.span: Handles the diagnostics section of configuration files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O método é um manipulador de seção que participa da resolução do definições de configuração na [ <System. Diagnostics> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/system-diagnostics-element.md) parte dos arquivos de configuração.The method is a section handler that participates in the resolution of configuration settings in the [<system.diagnostics>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/system-diagnostics-element.md) portion of configuration files.

Diagnostics> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/system-diagnostics-element.md) seção de um arquivo de configuração e retorna a tabela de hash.The method populates a with the values obtained from the [<system.diagnostics>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/system-diagnostics-element.md) section of a configuration file and returns the hashtable.
